mapper.insert: insert into plan (plan_name, plan_content, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values (#{planName},#{planContent},#{createTime},#{createBy}, #{updateTime},#{updateBy})

insert into plan (plan_name, plan_content, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values (#{data.planName},#{data.planContent},#{data.createTime},#{data.createBy}, #{data.updateTime},#{data.updateBy})
